title: lab1
description: Introduction to basic data visualization techniques and exploratory analysis.

title: lab2
description: Exploring different types of charts and their effective uses in data presentation.

title: lab3
description: Understanding color theory in data visualization and its impact on readability.

title: lab4
description: Creating interactive visualizations using modern JavaScript libraries.

title: lab5
description: Exploring real-world datasets and applying visualization techniques to extract insights.

title: lab6
description: Building dashboards with multiple linked visualizations for data storytelling.

title: lab7
description: Analyzing temporal data and visualizing trends over time with line and area charts.

title: lab8
description: Exploring spatial data visualization and mapping techniques.

title: lab9
description: Visualizing networks and relationships between entities in complex datasets.

title: lab10
description: Creating animations and transitions to enhance data visualization narratives.

title: lab11
description: Comparing different machine learning visualization techniques for model interpretation.

title: lab12
description: Final project: Applying all visualization techniques learned throughout the course.
